name: Lifestyle Ad
description: Energetic lifestyle advertisement with real-world usage

beats.name: scene_setter
beats.prompt_template: Wide establishing shot, vibrant lifestyle setting, {style_aesthetic}, dynamic energy

beats.name: person_intro
beats.prompt_template: Medium shot of person in lifestyle context, {style_aesthetic}, authentic moment

beats.name: product_interaction
beats.prompt_template: Close-up of person using {product_name}, {style_aesthetic}, natural interaction

beats.name: benefit_showcase
beats.prompt_template: Medium shot showing benefit of {product_name}, {style_aesthetic}, positive emotion

beats.name: final_shot
beats.prompt_template: Hero close-up of {product_name} with branding, {style_aesthetic}, memorable ending
